edu.nyu.cs.javagit.client
Class ClientManager

java.lang.Object
  edu.nyu.cs.javagit.client.ClientManager

public class ClientManager
extends java.lang.Object

This class manages the IClient instances of the various ClientTypes. It contains factory type functionality (the getClientType() method) but manages much more than just creating IClient instances.

Gets the singleton instance.

Returns:
The singleton instance.

getClientInstance

public IClient getClientInstance(ClientManager.ClientType clientType)
Gets an instance of the specified client type.

Parameters:
clientType - The type of client to get.
Returns:
An instance of the specified client type.

getPreferredClient

public IClient getPreferredClient()
Gets an instance of the preferred client type as set via the setPreferredClientType() method.

Returns:
An IClient instance for the preferred client type.

setPreferredClientType

public void setPreferredClientType(ClientManager.ClientType preferredClientType)
Sets the preferred client type.

Parameters:
preferredClientType - The type to set as the preferred client type. If the value is null, then the preferred client type is set to ClientType.CLI.
